code: import React from"react";import{useContext}from"react";import{CartContext}from"../../context/cart.context";import"./checkout-item.style.scss";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CheckoutItem=_ref=>{let{cartItem}=_ref;const{name,price,imageUrl,quantity}=cartItem;const{addItemToCart,removeItemToCart,clearItemFromCart}=useContext(CartContext);const addItemToCartHandler=()=>addItemToCart(cartItem);const removeItemToCartHandler=()=>removeItemToCart(cartItem);const clearItemFromCartHandler=()=>clearItemFromCart(cartItem);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"checkout-item-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"image-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`${imageUrl}`,alt:`${name}`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"quantity",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"arrow",onClick:removeItemToCartHandler,children:"\u276E"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"value",children:quantity}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"arrow",onClick:addItemToCartHandler,children:"\u276F"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"price",children:["$",price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"remove-button",onClick:clearItemFromCartHandler,children:[" ","\u2715"]})]});};export default CheckoutItem;
